metadata.title: CVE-2021-4021 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Radare2 in versions prior to 5.6.2, 5.6.0,5.5.4 and 5.5.2. Mapping a huge section filled with zeros of an ELF64binary for MIPS architecture can lead to uncontrolled resource consumptionand DoS.

criterions.comment: radare2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
